description: AI technology category definitions for AI Adoption reporting

ai-ml/vectordb.label: Vector Databases
ai-ml/vectordb.description: Vector storage for embeddings and RAG applications

ai-ml/mlops.label: MLOps Tools
ai-ml/mlops.description: Machine learning operations and model management

ai-ml/agents.label: AI Agents
ai-ml/agents.description: Autonomous AI agent frameworks with tool use capabilities
ai-ml/agents.security_notes: Agents can execute code, access files, and make network requests autonomously

ai-ml/patterns/tool-calling.label: Tool/Function Calling
ai-ml/patterns/tool-calling.description: LLM tool use and function calling implementations
ai-ml/patterns/tool-calling.security_notes: Tool inputs should be validated; avoid eval/exec with tool arguments

ai-ml/patterns/rag.label: RAG Implementations
ai-ml/patterns/rag.security_notes: Document sources should be validated; query injection risks

ai-ml/patterns/orchestration.label: Agent Orchestration
ai-ml/patterns/orchestration.security_notes: Multi-agent systems multiply attack surfaces; require strict resource limits

genai-tools.label: AI Coding Assistants
genai-tools.description: AI-powered code generation and assistance tools

simple_api_call.label: Simple API Call
simple_api_call.description: Direct LLM API calls without tools or agents

tool_calling.label: Tool/Function Calling
tool_calling.description: LLM with defined tools for external actions

rag_advanced.label: Advanced RAG
rag_advanced.description: Sophisticated RAG with reranking, hybrid search

autonomous_system.label: Autonomous System
autonomous_system.description: Self-directed goal pursuit with minimal human oversight

data_classification.ai-ml/apis: May process sensitive data via API calls
data_classification.ai-ml/agents: Autonomous execution with external access capabilities
data_classification.ai-ml/patterns/rag: Document embeddings may contain sensitive content
data_classification.genai-tools: May expose code context to external services

ai-ml/agents: Add rate limits and circuit breakers
Log all agent actions for audit
Implement kill switches for autonomous agents
